items.title: Ajit Mishra from Religare Broking suggests buying these three stocks today
items.description: NTPC is displaying a strong uptrend, characterised by a steady pattern of higher highs and higher lows.

items.title: Nifty IT shows bearish trend, Nifty Auto overbought; trading strategy here
items.description: The Nifty Auto Index appears overbought on the near-term charts, indicating a potential pullback in the coming sessions, likely after the monthly expiry.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: India markets set for higher open tracking global cues; Vedanta, BOI eyed
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Markets in India were likely to start on a positive note on Thursday, following the surge in markets in the Asia-Pacific region.

items.title: Stocks To Watch: SBI, Vedanta, HDFC Bank, Piramal Pharma, Bank of India
items.description: Stocks to watch: Piramal Pharma aims to double its revenue to $2 billion by FY30, while tripling its Ebitda, said company Chairperson Nandini Piramal.

items.title: Stock Market Today: Nifty expiry, Israel conflict & Kalana Ispat IPO debut
items.description: The uptrend was signalled by GIFT Nifty futures that were trading about 50 points higher than Nifty futures' last close, at 26,047.50, around 7:30 AM.

items.title: Manba Finance IPO allotment today: Check status, GMP, likely listing price

items.title: PB Fintech shares down 5% after co plans foray into healthcare space
items.description: The fall in PB Fintech share price comes after the company indicated that it may foray into the healthcare space.

items.title: Hero MotoCorp share price falls 3% in firm market; UBS maintains 'Sell'
items.description: Hero MotoCorp share price today declined 2.7 per cent in the intraday trade on Thursday. Read why global brokerage UBS sees nearly 45 per cent downside in the two-wheeler company's stock price

items.title: Diffusion Engineers IPO opens today: GMP up 48%; is it worth your money?
items.description: The unlisted shares of Diffusion Engineers were trading at a premium of Rs 80, or 48 per cent against the upper end of the IPO price, reflecting positive market sentiments for the public issue

items.title: Five-star Business Finance Block Deal: 28 mn shares change hands, stk up 4%
items.description: The surge in Five-Star Business Finance share price came after 28.1 million (or 2.81 crore) shares changed hands via a block deal.

items.title: Indian shares hit record highs helped by gains in IT and consumer firms
items.description: The consumer goods index was up 0.4 per cent and was among the top gainers of the 13 major sub-indexes

items.title: Indian bond yields may partly reverse fall as US peers move higher
items.description: US bond yields rose, as traders booked profits after a recent fall, and as yields witnessed a floor. However, the possibility that the Fed could do another outsized rate cut remain intact

items.title: This Tata Group stock has beat Sensex for a decade, surged 1,154% in 4 yrs
items.description: Trent shares hit a new high of Rs 7,939.90, following a 4% rally on the NSE after Citi initiated coverage on the stock with a 'Buy' rating and a target price of Rs 9,250.

items.title: India's private debt market to surpass $18 billion in AUM by year-end
items.description: The report highlights that India-focused private debt AUM grew from under $14 billion at the end of 2022 to nearly $18 billion a year later

items.title: Easy Trip Rebounds: Share gains 7% after hitting 52-wk low in last session
items.description: Easy Trip stock rebound followed a major drop of up to 8 per cent the previous day amid multiple block deals. The drop, meanwhile, led to a fresh 52-week low for the stock.

items.title: Intellect Design's biz unit launches eMACH.ai Retail 6DX; share price up 4%
items.description: Intellect Design's share price surged after the company's business unit, Intellect Digital Technology for Commerce (iDTC), launched eMACH.ai Retail 6DX, tailored for the Middle Eastern market.

items.title: Vedanta shareholders to rejoice: Company lines up for 4th dividend for FY25
items.description: The uptick in Vedanta's stock was fueled by the company's plan to declare a fourth interim dividend for FY25

items.title: Newgen Software surges 19% on heavy volumes; zooms 42% in two weeks
items.description: A combined 2.42 million equity shares, representing 1.73 per cent of the total equity of the company, had changed hands on the NSE and BSE till 11:21 AM.
